T.38 real time FAX over IP PSTN gateway

What does it do?

The T.38 gateway facility provides a robust interface between T.38 IP packet streams and and 8k samples/second audio streams. It provides the buffering and flow control features needed to maximum the tolerance of jitter and packet loss on the IP network.
